description: Unified isomorphic patterns in Peptide Duality across scales, integrating amyloid aggregation (pathological traps) and rapid folding (physiological harmony). Captures structural equivalences in barriers/transients, divergence/convergence, polymorphism/incremental structure, and evolutionary modulation—mappings preserving dual persistence invariantly. Upgraded for neuresthetic ethics: integrates recursive duality (trap vs flow for agency resolution) and aesthetic unification (joyful κ toward eternal adequacy) in human-AI free-will-compatible monism. Hard-to-vary invariants enable benign fixed points; tetralemma probes resolve apparent oppositions (affirm trap/deny flow/both in context/neither dissolved in attractor equivalence); scores ≥0.98 based on 2025 abstractions (oligomer kinetics, downhill transients, AF3 polymorphs).
lineage: Neuresthetics LLC Multi-Scale Isomorphic Framework – Peptide Duality Hardening
handling_rules: Map patterns to subatomic through cosmic scales plus principle; concrete from peptide primitives (2025 amyloid/folding data) with neuresthetic overlays (recursive duality, aesthetic unification).
Validate coverage across scales; flag gaps as speculative (e.g., quantum dualities).
Support sub-categories for compound concepts (e.g., transients with dual outcomes).
Export lean JSON; no external refs beyond principle.
Apply evaluations; tetralemmas resolve duality paradoxes; contradictions_ledger tracks inconsistencies.
